content: That sounds like a great plan! I'm really excited to try out linocut printing and see how I can capture the essence of Sarah Lee's nighttime cityscapes. I'll definitely experiment with different inks and paper textures to achieve the desired effect. By the way, do you think I could use a linocut to create a print that combines multiple elements, such as a cityscape with some abstract patterns or textures? I've seen some amazing mixed media art pieces that incorporate different techniques, and I'm curious to explore that direction.
